system.effect: The powerful blow cleaves the target from gullet to groin, revealing his internal organs and spilling them on to the ground before him. The target is now quite dead. The area and the target are awash with slippery gore. For the rest of the fight, any character who moves within four metres of the target's corpse must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or fall Prone.
